name: Sailor's Grave
description:
To make ends meet a late 19th century merchant steamship takes on some deadly cargo. Things take a turn for the worst and she must get to port before she goes under!

Windows 2000-win 11

32 bit intel/PPC mac 10.3.9 to Mojave. CATALINA NOT SUPPORTED!

Be sure to flick us a buck if you enjoy it!

Cheers
